CENTERS.NAME: Name
CENTERS.TAX.ID.HINT: If specified, this ID is displayed in invoices and Invoice is renamed to Tax Invoice.
CENTERS.TAX.NAME: Tax Name
CENTERS.INTERNAL_USE.HINT:
Makes center available to coordinators and admins only.
Prohibits all members from accessing the center!
CENTERS.HIDE_IN_MEMBER_SIGN_UP.HINT: Makes center not available for member self-registration.
CENTERS.CONFIRM_DELETE: Are you sure to delete the center?
CENTERS.FREE_ACCESS.HINT: Allows N hours of free WiFi access once a day for each user device. Displays Get Free Access option on WiFi splash page.
CENTERS.SESSION_GRACE_PERIOD.HINT: WiFi session grace period - extra time before and after reservation.
